text: Oh great, another Monday morning meeting!
I absolutely love getting stuck in traffic for hours.
The weather is so amazing today, said while it’s raining heavily.
I got promoted! Hard work really pays off.
I failed my exam again, what a pleasant surprise.
She really helped me finish my project on time.
Wow, I just love when my phone dies right before an important call.
This new movie is actually really good!
I can’t believe how lucky I am to spill coffee on myself again.
Thanks for reminding me of my mistakes, that’s so helpful.
